findings.title: Owner can mint
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint tokens.

findings.title: Dev address can change dev address
findings.description: The developer address has the privilege to change its own address.

findings.title: Fee address can change fee address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the fee address.

findings.title: Owner can add pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to add a new pool.

findings.title: Owner can change referral bonus
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the referral bonus in the contract.

findings.title: Owner can change deposit fee in basis points of pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the deposit fee in basis points of a pool.

findings.title: Owner can change allocation points of pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the allocation points of a pool.

findings.title: Owner can change block number in pool from which is allowed to receive reward
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the block number in a pool, allowing them to control when rewards are received.

findings.title: Owner Can Change Block Number in Pool from Which Is Not Allowed to Stake and Generate Rewards
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the block number in a pool, which is not allowed for staking and generating rewards.

findings.title: Owner can change emission rate
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the emission rate in the TEXOOrchestrator contract.

findings.title: Owner can change block number from which contract should start reduce emission rate
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the block number from which the contract starts reducing the emission rate.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: Function massUpdatePools() uses a loop to update all loops from the poolInfo list and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a large pool addresses list.

findings.title: OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a pool addresses list
findings.description: The function massUpdatePools() uses a loop to update all loops from the poolInfo list and may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the pool addresses list is too big.
